entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@BillCassidy 2/2
Would've made more sense to put you in charge of managing the coronavirus issue since you're a doctor. Putting Pence in charge of this makes no sense since he has no background or knowledge of this field. Also given his ideas, he should not head a critical science project.
